title: LF Diamond players for serious Diamond+ ranked team
body:
Looking for players who are consistently on 5-7 nights a week to play in a ranked team. Looking to train in preseason and play in weekly tournaments at end of year.
Add on League
IGN: bluz0r

replies.body: dude you wana scrim against our team?

Sure man, I added you (Dela Cruz). 
add me too if it didn't go through! Can organise a time
